_sText: This is an old facility on the surface of mars, surrounded by a huge desert. [Design] - HDR - Cubemaps - 3D Skybox - Sandstorm [Gameplay] - 64 spawns (32 each), but I recommend playing the map with less players - Mostly climbing hiding places, a few possibilities for barricading - High framerate Please post the server ip if you host this map. Now enjoy! [Update History] -- (18.03.2010) v2 -- - Airlock doors can now be opened independently - Fixed water bug in canalysation - Balanced some camping spots - Made some areas brighter and reduced dust density outside - Added custom skybox texture (thanks karatek√§fer!)
